description: Detects the use of IOX - a tool for port forwarding and intranet proxy purposes
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: PUA- IOX Tunneling Tool Execution
query: ((process.executable.text:"*\\iox.exe") OR (process.command_line.text:("*.exe\ fwd\ \-l\ *" OR "*.exe\ fwd\ \-r\ *" OR "*.exe\ proxy\ \-l\ *" OR "*.exe\ proxy\ \-r\ *")) OR (winlog.event_data.Hashes:(*MD5\=9DB2D314DD3F704A02051EF5EA210993* OR *SHA1\=039130337E28A6623ECF9A0A3DA7D92C5964D8DD* OR *SHA256\=C6CF82919B809967D9D90EA73772A8AA1C1EB3BC59252D977500F64F1A0D6731*)) OR (md5:"9db2d314dd3f704a02051ef5ea210993") OR (sha1:"039130337e28a6623ecf9a0a3da7d92c5964d8dd") OR (sha256:"c6cf82919b809967d9d90ea73772a8aa1c1eb3bc59252d977500f64f1a0d6731"))
